meanings.definition: The act of being born again or regenerated.
meanings.sent1: The rebirths of the flowers in spring bring joy to all.
meanings.sent2: The concept of rebirths is central to many spiritual beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The rebirths of old traditions in modern times can be quite fascinating.
meanings.sent4: Just like a caterpillar transforms into a butterfly, rebirths can lead to beautiful changes.
meanings.sent5: The rebirths of hope after a difficult time can be incredibly uplifting.

meanings.sent1: The rebirths of ideas can lead to innovation and progress.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, the rebirths of individuals are celebrated with special ceremonies.
meanings.sent3: The rebirths of old trends in fashion can sometimes be surprising.
meanings.sent4: Just as a phoenix rises from its ashes, rebirths can symbolize resilience.
meanings.sent5: The rebirths of the city after the disaster were nothing short of miraculous.
